ItemDescription.Description: Kills or Assists increase nearby allies' stats.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Getting a kill or assist on enemies causes you and allies within 70 units to gain stacks of energy. Energy stacks provide 2% Movement Speed, 2% Attack Speed, and 10MP5 per stack. Lasts 10s and stacks up to 6 times.

ShortDesc: Kills and assists give benefits for self and nearby allies
